alert.note: Alert for Chisago (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Chisago...Isanti... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding in the area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Cambridge, Stanchfield, Grandy, Bodum and Cambridge Airport.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage areas and low lying spots.
